metadata.title: MACKLEMORE FEAT KESHA - GOOD OLD DAYS (OFFICIAL MUSIC VIDEO)
metadata.creator: Macklemore

tracks.text: Camcorder film of a moon over a field, the woods, and the view from inside a moving vehicle
A man with an arm tattoo works on a car engine.
On the side of the road, a brown haired man and a woman stand at the trunk of a minivan. Behind them is a forest characteristic of the Pacific Northwest.

Kesha and Macklemore are nearby. Kesha, with white hair in braids, a white coat, and white cowboy boots, sits inside the open side door of the minivan. Macklemore, in blue jeans and a yellow shirt, stands in front of her. He tosses a small object and swings a stick
The other couple pile objects into the minivan trunk.
Macklemore and the girls begin to push the van. As it moves, the girls hop in the open doors. Macklemore catches up from behind.
In the back, Macklemore smiles at Kesha.
The brown haired couple smile at each other up front.
Kesha looks at papers. Macklemore spreads peanut butter on multigrain bread.
Kesha rests her feet on his leg, and looks at him through a vintage camcorder.
In the camcorder's film, he covers his eyes and smiles.
In film, Kesha sits with the woods and sun through the window behind her. She puts her hand out to cover the lens, revealing a drawing of an eye on her palm.
In a clearing, trucks and vans make a circle. People sit in the middle.
Kesha and Macklemore get out and embrace 2 black men wearing a Fedora and Newsboy hat.
A man wraps an arm around Kesha's shoulder, takes off his own hat, and places it on Macklemore's head.
Macklemore sits on the ground. Kesha lies on a cot behind him and rests a hand on his shoulder.
In film, they smile at each other in close up.
Kesha sings to us, as if we were lying next to her
People hike, including Macklemore and the men in hats.
In film, a girl walks on a log.
Macklemore walks through the woods, along a line of abandoned, rusted cars
In film, Macklemore and the brown haired man leap from a dock into water. Girls laugh in the water. Macklemore rests his arms on the dock.
The 6 sit on a log by the shore
In film, a dime sized crab crawls over a hand.
In film, the brown haired girl and Macklemore walk along the shore. He skips a rock.
Kesha walks in a field of grass that rises to her shoulders.

She wears an embroidered shear wrap over her white dress and blue flower necklace. Macklemore films her as she walks away, and a foot of the wrap drags through the grass behind her. In film, she turns to look at us.
She runs her fingers through the grass. The word LOVE is written on her knuckles. She has grass green nail polish and a chunky vintage ring.
The moon rises between blades of grass.
At night, Macklemore plays on a white, upright piano. Lights are strung between vans and through the trees. People sit by a fireplace, with candles lit in the background,
In film, Kesha then Macklemore smile while averting their eyes.
Kesha plays. Candle light flickers on the piano's exposed hammers, which strike the strings. Branches hang over the keys.
They sing and smile at each other.
The crowd gathers in the circle and people begin to dance.

A blond woman smiles in the candlelight. In film during the day, she strums a guitar. A girl in jeans sits next to her, playing with a football. Macklemore and Newsboy hat man sit on a blue plastic couch chatting.

At night, the newsboy hat man dances and looks across a crackling fire. A crowd laughs, including a woman with a round face. In film, the round face woman plays hides her face behind the football and laughs. A man with curly brown hair and sunglasses reads a book.
At night, the curly brown hair man, the same as from the van, plays guitar.
Macklemore rests his arm on Kesha's shoulder
People dance around the campfire.
In film, a cake covered in candles is presented to a black woman with red hair.
Embers burn in the campfire
Fade to black
Credits roll. Directed by Johnny Valencia. Produced by Honna Kimmerer.
